trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an open connection to a data source, and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access relational databases.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx x xxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx .XXX Xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string used to open a database.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx x xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A string containing connection settings.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the time to wait while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The time (in seconds) to wait for a connection to open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx $xx xxxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is 15 seconds.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx 00 xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the name of the current database or the database to be used after a connection is opened.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the current database or the name of the database to be used once a connection is open.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
The default value is an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the current state of the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Begins a database transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object representing the new transaction.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Changes the current database for an open Connection object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx $xxxxxx$Xxxxxxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the database to use in place of the current database.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Closes the connection to the database.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates and returns a Command object associated with the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A Command object associated with the connection.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens a database connection with the settings specified by the ConnectionString property of the provider-specific Connection object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$XxxxxxxxxxXxxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx$xxxxxxxx Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
